features: 【2 Pack High-Efficiency Air Purifiers for Small, Medium Rooms】-🌿 2Pack option is warmly prepared to meet customers larger air purifying areas demand, more than double efficiency. H13 True HEPA air purifier for Pet Owners, Parents with Newborns. Air filter purify 99.97% of 0.1 Microns airborne particles, perfect for quickly cleaning a wide range of Bad Air, pet dander, cooking and smoking in a certain space. Let you freely enjoying fresh air at home!

【Ultra-Quiet & Night Light Sleep Mode】-🌿 In Night Light sleep mode, click the Night Light button for the second time to reduce the brightness of the warm white light by 50%, can replace the dazzling light in the bedroom, sound is as low as 20dB, which is very quiet and will not wake up or disturb the sleep of you and your family, including your pets. Keep silent 20dB operation to purify the air, provide you with a quiet and comfortable sleeping environment, enjoy High-Quality Sleep!

【Energy Saving & Money Saving】-🌿 At 10 cents kWh in the city, M(Medium) Fan Speed Mode power is 5W - only $0.08 per week for continuous operation (24 h/7 days). HEPA air purifiers are perfect for bedrooms, dorms, apartment, medium rooms, small rooms, offices, desk, desktop, living rooms, kitchens, indoor or bookroom. 3 Fan Speed(H/M/L) and 3 Timer Options (2H/4H/8H), you can achieve maximum energy saving according to the specific mode you set.

【Very Easy To Use & Filter Replacement Reminder】-🌿Small, lightweight, 2.31lb, 6.7*6.7*10.6inch, circular design (360° intake at the bottom) portable compact air purifier for home, we recommend that you replace the filter element at least every 3-6 months or so for the best air purification effect! Search ASIN: B0B6BPPFJ6 to buy the original filter of KJ80. No need specialist knowledge, easy to replace in a few minutes! (NOTE: Other brands of filters are not sized to fit our Druiap purifiers.)

【Best After-Sales Service】-🌿 (Available for California),100% quality assurance, all the products we send have undergone numerous tests and multiple certifications. Air Cleaner has passed EPA ETL CE FCC RoHS CARB Certification. If there are any question, you can contact us anytime. We will have a professional customer service team to communicate with you! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air filters!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these about one year ago for a new house. They were on sale and a great price for two small air purifiers. They worked right out of the box, super easy to use, and pull a lot of dust and pet hair out of the air. I have a large dog and three cats so it can be quite dusty. They have multiple modes to make them quieter. I keep them running pretty much 24/7 in my small office and living room. I clean them with a vacuum to get the dust and pet hair off the filter, use a bit al all-purpose cleaner on the plastic cap, pop it back in, and it's good to go -- takes maybe 5 minutes for both. They're small and fit pretty much anywhere, even a night table. I plan to purchase more in the future for other parts of my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good to breathe again!
reviews.reviewText: I get allergies year-round, especially when the weather starts to change drastically. We live in an older building on the top floor with just one A/C Wall Unit for our whole condo. As one can imagine it can get pretty stuffy and humid in here quickly, especially when it is warmer outside. This causes us to leave the windows open a majority of the time. With that, my allergies start to flare up a lot because of the stuffiness being inside and the outside air coming in and it gets real bad. This includes watery eyes, stuffy/runny nose, and sneeze attacks. I’m talking used tissues everywhere, constant sniffling, mouth-breathing, 10 sneezes in a row (with no breaks in between) bad. In addition, we raise a 2-year old cat who loves to cuddle at night when my allergies are at their worst (she is terrified of loud consistent sneezes).I couldn’t take waking up in the middle of the night with sneeze attacks anymore and being unable to properly snuggle with my cuddle buddy, so I started looking for air purifiers (at a reasonable price). I needed something that would get the job done ASAP. Low and behold I came across this product, the Druiap air purifier. It seemed like a majority of people were satisfied with this product compared to other products, plus it was on sale for less than $50. I couldn’t refuse a good sale, so I went ahead and purchased one to try it out.Best purchase I had ever made! We put the first one on the ledge of the kitchen bar window and started it up. After just a few hours I was able to breathe better than I have in a long time. It wasn’t loud (almost unnoticeable) and the buttons were pretty self explanatory. I wanted to get a second one right away! My boyfriend thought I was over exaggerating (he does not get allergies like I do) and that maybe it was all in my head. How did I prove him wrong? He is a very light sleeper at night, so my surprise sneeze attacks always wake him up. At this point, we only had the one air purifier in the living room/kitchen. We tested out me sleeping in the room vs the living room with the window or sliding patio door cracked open and our cat snuggling with me at night. Of course, my allergies were more active in the room and once I got into the living room area my nose instantly started to clear up.To make my point even more valid, my sister visits from time to time and she loves her cat niece. The biggest issue is that she has very severe allergies to both dogs and cats. When she spends the night it is worse than mine. She came up unexpectedly at just the right timing when we were performing this mini experiment. She quickly noticed how her allergies did not flare up like they usually do. She was shocked when I told her it was the new air purifier we got that changed our lives (she will now be visiting more often than I anticipated). We ended up getting a second one after all for the master bedroom within the span of a few weeks.I am happy to report that I am breathing like I got a new nose and I can snuggle my lil furry baby every night without scaring her off. I just love how it counts down until a new filter needs to be replaced, how minimalistic it looks, and how amazing it really works. Still trying to convince my boyfriend to just get one in the second bedroom, his home office, so I can hang out in there more while he works from home during the week (he has not budged yet). Now that it is colder outside, the humidity is lower and my allergies are nonexistent for the moment. However, it is still useful for strong smells. We keep our cat’s litter box in the corner next to our non-functioning fireplace (our bathroom is tiny and there was no other place to put it). Unfortunately, her litter box does not have the little door attached anymore since it kept locking her inside for some reason. Now she LOVES her wet food but it does cause her to make a more noticeable odor when she uses the bathroom (it was 10x worse during warmer days when it was stuffy in the condo). When you entered the condo, it really hit you in the face and no amount of cleaning could make it go away. Now we hardly notice the litter smell or strong odors at all anymore every time we walk into our home. Smells that used to linger from cooking are now gone within a few hours and/or just super minimal than before as well. For the price I got it at, it really can’t be beat. This is a wonderful and miraculous product! Thanks for my sense of smell back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this air purifier! Works great, and very well.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this air purifier to give it a try specifically because we were close to bringing a baby home and wanted to have clean air and worry less of the condition of the air our baby was breathing. We had looked into a few other purifiers including the Hepa filter ones that everyone was purchasing due to covid, but the price on most was out of our budget. My boyfriend while searching found this purifier and decided to purchase it as it was in our budget and had pretty good reviews. All I can say is This air purifier works great. We keep it in our living room, as it’s for a big enough space. We also have another one in our bedroom. We love how this air purifier has different settings, it also has a timer so you don’t have to leave it running all day and all night, you can set how long you want to go on for. It also has a sleep mode, and a display screen that tells you the time and most importantly how clean the air is. We turn it off quite often when we’re not home and turn it back on when we do get home and it’s quite impressive how fast it works to clean the air, those numbers go down pretty fast, so we know it’s working. Something that we also love about the purifier is that it doesn’t make any noise whatsoever. As you can see on the image I keep my baby’s swing next to it and he sleeps perfectly fine. He doesn’t get startled, and is a also by our door that leads outside. That’s how we know it works. Overall we are extremely happy with out purchase, so happy we ran into it. We highly recommend, especially if you also want clean air with no noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for 2-pack
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these Air Purifiers for my bedroom and living room, and I have been very impressed with their performance. These air purifiers have made a noticeable difference in the air quality in my room and have helped me to breathe easier while sleeping. With two pets and seasonal allergies year round, I am pleased with how I am able to breathe better with this addition to our apartment.Another thing I love about this air purifier is how quiet it is, I can barely hear it when it's on the lowest fan speed, which is perfect for when we are sleeping.With its compact and stylish design, which makes it easy to fit into any room, as well as its two for the price of one, it's very affordable compared to other air purifiers on the market, which is a huge plus.Overall, I highly recommend these air purifiers for anyone looking for an affordable and effective air purifier for their home. It's easy to use, quiet and does a great job of removing pollutants from the air.
